textlinespara.line: The Club values the importance of maintaining the confidentiality and privacy of its Members and suppliers.
The Committee shall adhere to the Privacy Act 1988 and subsequent amendments.
Our Privacy Policy sets out to outline in plain English:
The collection of your personal information;
How we use and disclosure your personal information;
The quality of your personal information;
How you can access your personal information;
Security of your personal information; and How to contact us.
